text: Swedish bandy clubs play in the Swedish bandy league system, where the top- tier is Elitserien and lower levers are Allsvenskan, Division 1 and Division 2. The lower levels are in turn divided into groups based on geography. The Swedish championship is decided through a play-off for the eight best teams in Elitserien each year; the Swedish championship has been played every year since 1907. There is also a Swedish domestic cup tournament, Svenska Cupen, since 2005. Here is a list of clubs which have an article at the English Wikipedia: {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Club !
